Team Tokens¶

class terrasnek.team_tokens.TFCTeamTokens(base_url, org_name, headers, verify)¶

Each team can have a special service account API token that is not associated with a specific user.

https://www.terraform.io/docs/cloud/api/team-tokens.html

create(team_id)¶

POST /teams/:team_id/authentication-token

Generates a new team token and overrides existing token if one exists.

destroy(team_id)¶

DELETE /teams/:team_id/authentication-token
